abstract: Derrick D. Cephas, who is stepping down as chief executive of Amalgamated Bank at the end of April, will join Weil, Gotshal & Manges as head of the law firm’s financial regulatory group.

lead_paragraph: Derrick D. Cephas, who is stepping down as chief executive of Amalgamated Bank at the end of April, will soon join Weil, Gotshal & Manges as head of the law firm’s financial regulatory group.
